Text:
Zombie Fairy Tales (2011)-P2P

Sit down by the gravesite and with a big bowl of brain food, kiddies, ’cause Mother Gruesom’s about to treat you to a collection of classic stories of crawling cadavers! Enjoy timeless tales such as ‘Little Dead Riding Hood,’ ‘The Ginger-Dead Man,’ ‘Moldylocks,’ and ‘Alice in Undead-land.’
Cover-pic I Google'd looks pretty cool. Thanks for sharing!
